original_text: The chief priests and the whole Sanhedrin were looking for evidence against Jesus so that they could put him to death, but they did not find any.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 온 공회가 예수를 죽이려고 그를 칠 증거를 찾되 얻지 못하니

sentences.original_text: The chief priests and the whole Sanhedrin
were looking for evidence against Jesus
so that they could put him to death
but they did not find any
